content:
TITLE: Installing AgoraRTC SDK using package managers
DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the AgoraRTC SDK using npm, pnpm, or yarn package managers. This allows developers to easily integrate the SDK into their web projects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/packages/rtc-web-v4/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# with npm
npm i agora-rtc-sdk-ng
# or with pnpm
pnpm add agora-rtc-sdk-ng
# or with yarn
yarn add agora-rtc-sdk-ng
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing AgoraRTC SDK via Package Managers (bash)
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to install the AgoraRTC SDK using npm, pnpm, or yarn package managers. These commands add the agora-rtc-sdk-ng package to your project dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# with npm
npm i agora-rtc-sdk-ng
# or with pnpm
pnpm add agora-rtc-sdk-ng
# or with yarn
yarn add agora-rtc-sdk-ng
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing AgoraRTC SDK using package managers
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install the AgoraRTC SDK using npm, pnpm, or yarn package managers. It provides commands for each package manager to add the 'agora-rtc-sdk-ng' package to your project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/README-zh_CN.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# 使用 npm
npm i agora-rtc-sdk-ng
# 或者使用 pnpm
pnpm add agora-rtc-sdk-ng
# 或者使用 yarn
yarn add agora-rtc-sdk-ng
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including AgoraRTC SDK via CDN
DESCRIPTION: HTML script tag for including the AgoraRTC SDK via CDN. This method allows developers to quickly add the SDK to their web pages without using a package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/packages/rtc-web-v4/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="https://download.agora.io/sdk/release/AgoraRTC_N-4.19.0.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including AgoraRTC SDK via CDN (HTML)
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to include the AgoraRTC SDK in a web page using a CDN link. This script tag loads version 4.20.0 of the SDK and makes the AgoraRTC object available globally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="https://download.agora.io/sdk/release/AgoraRTC_N-4.20.0.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including AgoraRTC SDK via CDN
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to include the AgoraRTC SDK in your HTML file using a CDN link. It loads version 4.20.0 of the SDK, which will expose an 'AgoraRTC' object globally for use in your application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/README-zh_CN.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="https://download.agora.io/sdk/release/AgoraRTC_N-4.20.0.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing and Running 8 Channel Audio Demo for Agora RTC Web
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install dependencies using pnpm and run the multi-opus quick demo. It first installs all required packages and then runs the development server specifically for the multi-opus demo project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-multiopus/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm i
pnpm -F=./projects/quick-demo-multiopus/ run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for AgoraRTC React Demo
DESCRIPTION: Command to install project dependencies using pnpm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-react/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for AgoraRTC Vue Demo
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required dependencies for the AgoraRTC Vue demonstration project using the pnpm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-vue/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all necessary project dependencies using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-live-video/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Agora Plugin VAD Example (Shell)
DESCRIPTION: Command to install project dependencies using npm. This should be run after cloning the project repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/agora-plugin-vad-example/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install project dependencies using PNPM package manager
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-svelte/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running AgoraRTC React Demo in Development Mode
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the React quick start demo in development mode using pnpm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-react/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running AgoraRTC Vue Demo Locally
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Vue quick start demo on a local development server using pnpm as the package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-vue/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run vue
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Svelte Demo in Development
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Svelte quick start demo in development mode
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-svelte/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run svelte
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile and start a hot-reloading development server for the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-live-video/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Development Server for Agora Plugin VAD Example (Shell)
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile and start a development server with hot-reloading for the Agora Plugin VAD example project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/agora-plugin-vad-example/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building AgoraRTC React Demo for Production
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the React quick start demo for production deployment using pnpm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-react/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building AgoraRTC Vue Demo for Production
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Vue quick start demo for production deployment, creating optimized static assets via pnpm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-vue/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run build:vue
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Svelte Demo for Production
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Svelte quick start demo for production deployment
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-svelte/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run build:svelte
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building for Production
DESCRIPTION: Command to type-check, compile, and minify the project for production deployment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-live-video/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Production Version of Agora Plugin VAD Example (Shell)
DESCRIPTION: Command to type-check, compile, and minify the project for production deployment. This creates optimized build artifacts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/agora-plugin-vad-example/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linting with ESLint
DESCRIPTION: Command to run ESLint for code linting and identifying potential issues in the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/agoraio/agora-rtc-web/blob/main/projects/quick-demo-live-video/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm run lint
```
